marklogic.body: When I read, I don't picture the characters as anybody I already know... so I'd say I pictured Coin as a combo of Helen Mirren and Meryl Streep. But what about Cate Blanchett? I know she's young, but the you'd be surprised at what the make-up department can do (look at Effie!). She has the piercing, kinda squinty eyes and the bone structure that I imagined Coin has, and I think with a pin-straight wig she would look perfect (I actually pictured Coin as one of those perfect-looking old women in the rejuvenating makeup commercials). Her look and performance as the Soviet in Indiana Jones/ Crystal Skull puts her high on my list of candidates. (No doubt she has the skills to pull Off the Cold, calculating Coin.)
